Player History
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 3/3/1986 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 8/24/1987 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1988, off Rick Aguilera (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/1988, off Calvin Schiraldi (NYM)...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (M) on 6/24/1989...
Drove in 6 runs against Cincinnati on 7/12/1989...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1989...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against St. Louis on 4/13/1990...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/1/1990 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,028,571 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/1991, hitting .522 with 5 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Montreal on 8/10/1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/1991, hitting .417 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
2/2/1992: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,414,286 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/1992, hitting .474 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/1992, hitting .409 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
